subject: Dreamweaver $59
body:
A hobby is hard work you wouldn't do for a living.

Let us cross over the river and rest under the shade of the trees.

The one way to get thin is to re-establish a purpose in life.

Counsel woven into the fabric of real life is wisdom.

People must not do things for fun. We are not here for fun. There is no reference to fun in any act of Parliament.

In the adversity of our best friends we often find something that does not displease us.

Give a man health and a course to steer and he'll never stop to trouble about whether he's happy or not.

Ignorance is like the itch -- the less you have of it the better off you are.

With mirth and laughter let old wrinkles come. [Merchant Of Venice]

I stay a little longer, as one stays, to cover up the embers that still burn.

The end may justify the means as long as there is something that justifies the end.

As to conforming outwardly, and living your own life inwardly, I have not a very high opinion of that course.

Courage is a quality so necessary for maintaining virtue, that it is always respected, even when it is associated with vice.
